character.age: 25 years old, with a youthful appearance despite her age
character.background: Eleanor was born into a family of modest means. Her parents were both members of the lower class and worked multiple jobs to make ends meet. Despite these hardships, Eleanor's parents instilled in her a strong sense of morality and compassion for others. She grew up with a desire to help those less fortunate than herself and has dedicated her life to making the world a better place.
